title: Bea's Block
overview: From the makers of Sesame Street, this animated preschool series follows Bea Mantilla, a compassionate and curious Mexican-American five-year-old, as she figures out what it takes to be a good friend. Along with her two best friends, Ty and Lexi, Bea's quest leads them on wacky "Kindness Adventures" around their diverse and inclusive neighborhood of Blocktown. Whether they're creating a "Blocketball" skills camp or searching for a lost chameleon, these three best friends explore a range of emotions from disappointment to excitement, all while learning how to be kind.
